description: As a user, I want to be able to subscribe to the newsletter so that I can receive updates and news about the company and its products.
As a borrower, I want to be able to calculate my monthly loan repayment amount so that I can plan my budget accordingly.
acceptanceCriteria: - The repayment calculator should allow the user to input the loan amount, interest rate, and loan term.
- The calculator should display the monthly repayment amount based on the input values.
- The repayment amount should be calculated using the standard amortization formula.
- The calculator should also display the total amount of interest paid over the loan term.

description: As a borrower, I want to be able to compare different loan options and their repayment amounts so that I can choose the best option for me.
acceptanceCriteria: - The repayment calculator should allow the user to input multiple loan options, including loan amount, interest rate, and loan term.
- The calculator should display the monthly repayment amount for each loan option.
- The repayment amounts should be calculated using the standard amortization formula.
- The calculator should also display the total amount of interest paid over the loan term for each option.
- The user should be able to easily compare the repayment amounts and interest paid for each loan option.

description: As a user, I want to be able to apply for a credit card online so that I can easily access credit and manage my finances.
acceptanceCriteria: - The credit card application form should be easily accessible from the bank's website.
- The application form should require the user to provide personal information such as their name, address, and contact details.
- The application form should also require the user to provide financial information such as their income and employment status.
- The user should be able to submit the application form online and receive a confirmation of their application.

description: As a user, I want to be able to view my credit card balance and transaction history online so that I can keep track of my spending and payments.
acceptanceCriteria: - The user should be able to log in to their online banking account to view their credit card balance and transaction history.
- The balance should be displayed prominently on the account dashboard.
- The transaction history should be easily accessible and should include details such as the date, amount, and merchant name for each transaction.
- The user should be able to filter and search the transaction history to find specific transactions.

description: As a borrower, I want to be able to calculate my monthly loan repayment amount so that I can plan my budget accordingly.
acceptanceCriteria: - The repayment calculator should allow the user to input the loan amount, interest rate, and loan term.
- The calculator should display the monthly repayment amount based on the input values.
- The repayment amount should be calculated using the standard amortization formula.
- The calculator should also display the total interest paid over the loan term.

description: As a borrower, I want to be able to compare different loan options by calculating the monthly repayment amount for each option.
acceptanceCriteria: - The repayment calculator should allow the user to input multiple loan options, including loan amount, interest rate, and loan term.
- The calculator should display the monthly repayment amount for each loan option.
- The repayment amount should be calculated using the standard amortization formula.
- The calculator should also display the total interest paid over the loan term for each option.
- The user should be able to easily compare the different loan options based on the repayment amount and total interest paid.

description: As a user, I want to be able to apply for a credit card online so that I can easily access credit and manage my finances.
acceptanceCriteria: - The credit card application form should be easily accessible from the bank's website.
- The application form should require the user to provide personal information such as their name, address, and contact details.
- The application form should also require the user to provide financial information such as their income and employment status.
- The user should be able to submit the application form online and receive a confirmation of their application.

description: As a user, I want to be able to view my credit card statement online so that I can keep track of my spending and payments.
acceptanceCriteria: - The credit card statement should be easily accessible from the user's online banking account.
- The statement should display the user's current balance, available credit, and any recent transactions.
- The statement should also display the user's payment due date and minimum payment amount.
- The user should be able to download and print their credit card statement for their records.
